entry.source: {F812}Hermit man\0{F87A,97}{F813,1,403212}Kiyoharu had a very hard time of it{F801}in this shelter, just after God's{F801}wrath rained down.{F801}{F802}Since his friend allied with the angels{F801}to defeat the demons, there was no one{F801}to stop God...{F801}{F802}And in the end, His wrath came down...{F801}{F802}Kiyoharu must've felt responsible. He{F801}kept praying to God, even while everyone{F801}mocked him for it.{F801}{F802}He was your age when all that started.{F801}No wonder he looks the way he does{F801}now, eh?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hermit man\0{F87A,97}{F813,1,403212}Kiyoharu had a very hard time of it{F801}in this shelter, just after God's{F801}wrath rained down.{F801}{F802}Since his friend allied with the angels{F801}to defeat the demons, there was no one{F801}to stop God...{F801}{F802}And in the end, His wrath came down...{F801}{F802}Kiyoharu must've felt responsible. He{F801}kept praying to God, even while everyone{F801}mocked him for it.{F801}{F802}He was your age when all that started.{F801}No wonder he looks the way he does{F801}now, eh?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hermit man\0{F87A,97}{F813,1,403202}Kiyoharu told us Pluto is dead!{F801}{F802}He said he just sensed it. Only Kiyoharu{F801}could do something like that...{F801}{F802}He was running around inside the{F801}shelter. Seemed so happy.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hermit man\0{F87A,97}{F813,1,403202}Kiyoharu told us Pluto is dead!{F801}{F802}He said he just sensed it. Only Kiyoharu{F801}could do something like that...{F801}{F802}He was running around inside the{F801}shelter. Seemed so happy.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hermit man\0{F87A,97}{F813,1,403202}Everyday, we have a series of meetings{F801}with Akira. The time flies around here.{F801}{F802}But keeping busy makes me feel like{F801}we're getting somewhere, you know?{F801}So it's not so bad.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hermit man\0{F87A,97}{F813,1,403202}Everyday, we have a series of meetings{F801}with Akira. The time flies around here.{F801}{F802}But keeping busy makes me feel like{F801}we're getting somewhere, you know?{F801}So it's not so bad.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Downtrodden man\0{F87A,162}{F813,1,403242}I remember... There were guys who{F801}worshipped demons...{F801}{F802}I know now that there is no God. If{F801}those guys asked, I would probably{F801}follow them...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Downtrodden man\0{F87A,162}{F813,1,403242}I remember... There were guys who{F801}worshipped demons...{F801}{F802}I know now that there is no God. If{F801}those guys asked, I would probably{F801}follow them...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Downtrodden man\0{F87A,162}{F813,1,403242}Hmm... Pluto's dead, huh? One less{F801}headache, I guess.{F801}{F802}But we're still loaded with chores.{F801}Ain't got time to blame God.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Downtrodden man\0{F87A,162}{F813,1,403242}Hmm... Pluto's dead, huh? One less{F801}headache, I guess.{F801}{F802}But we're still loaded with chores.{F801}Ain't got time to blame God.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Downtrodden man\0{F87A,162}{F813,1,403242}I know the idea of the Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado is important, but we also{F801}need guys who can fight.{F801}{F802}There's more and more demons all the{F801}time now. Geez... we don't even have{F801}time to curse God, you know?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Downtrodden man\0{F87A,162}{F813,1,403242}I know the idea of the Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado is important, but we also{F801}need guys who can fight.{F801}{F802}There's more and more demons all the{F801}time now. Geez... we don't even have{F801}time to curse God, you know?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter woman\0{F87A,100}{F813,1,403103}The place we call Pluto Castle is to{F801}the southeast from here. Go over the{F801}bridge there and you'll see it.{F801}{F802}You'll know it when you see a dome-{F801}shaped building with horns.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter woman\0{F87A,100}{F813,1,403103}The place we call Pluto Castle is to{F801}the southeast from here. Go over the{F801}bridge there and you'll see it.{F801}{F802}You'll know it when you see a dome-{F801}shaped building with horns.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter woman\0{F87A,100}{F813,1,403103}So Pluto Castle's still standing, even{F801}after its master is dead...{F801}{F802}I still feel like God has abandoned us.{F801}I guess we're on our own no matter how{F801}far we go...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter woman\0{F87A,100}{F813,1,403103}So Pluto Castle's still standing, even{F801}after its master is dead...{F801}{F802}I still feel like God has abandoned us.{F801}I guess we're on our own no matter how{F801}far we go...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter woman\0{F87A,100}{F813,1,403133}So Pluto Castle's still standing, even{F801}after its master is dead... Heh, why{F801}wouldn't it?{F801}{F802}I still feel like God has abandoned us.{F801}I guess we're on our own no matter how{F801}far we go...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter woman\0{F87A,100}{F813,1,403133}So Pluto Castle's still standing, even{F801}after its master is dead... Heh, why{F801}wouldn't it?{F801}{F802}I still feel like God has abandoned us.{F801}I guess we're on our own no matter how{F801}far we go...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,84}{F813,1,401601}We've always imagined God as something{F801}that's good for our cause...{F801}{F802}So maybe killing Pluto is going against{F801}His will.{F801}{F802}But think about it... Doesn't it make{F801}you mad? All I want is to fight back.{F801}Give Him a firm answer.{F801}{F802}I'm counting on you about this Pluto{F801}thing. The remote'll be your reward...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,84}{F813,1,401601}We've always imagined God as something{F801}that's good for our cause...{F801}{F802}So maybe killing Pluto is going against{F801}His will.{F801}{F802}But think about it... Doesn't it make{F801}you mad? All I want is to fight back.{F801}Give Him a firm answer.{F801}{F802}I'm counting on you about this Pluto{F801}thing. The remote'll be your reward...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,84}{F813,1,401601}By the way, you released the people in{F801}Shibuya, right?{F801}{F802}Can't say I approve of your unauthorized{F801}use of a Terminal, but...{F801}{F802}You made everyone's dreams come true.{F801}From the bottom of my heart, thank you{F801}for that.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,84}{F813,1,401601}By the way, you released the people in{F801}Shibuya, right?{F801}{F802}Can't say I approve of your unauthorized{F801}use of a Terminal, but...{F801}{F802}You made everyone's dreams come true.{F801}From the bottom of my heart, thank you{F801}for that.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tough woman\0{F87A,98}{F813,1,403333}You guys beat Pluto, right? Then why{F801}not help out our association too?{F801}{F802}I know Tokyo's a mess, but it's where{F801}we've got to live.{F801}
